name: MEC All Day Essentials Seamless Scoop Bra - Women's
categories: All Day Essentials Seamless Scoop Bra
description:
Seamless and soft for everyday comfort. The engineered knit fabric is breathable and offers light support for low-impact activities. Plus, it's made with a high recycled content so you can feel good about your helping to reduce textile waste.Made of soft, moisture wicking blend of nylon (some recycled content) and spandex.Sizes cover a larger range than other MEC garments, thanks to super-stretchy material. Please refer to our size chart to find your size.Scoop back and wider straps give a flattering look and won't dig in.Internal cup pockets let you add inserts (not included).Includes mesh bag for washing and packing.

        Sustainability
